properties.areaDesc: Central and Southern Lewis and Clark
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 14 at 7:59PM MST by NWS Great Falls MT
properties.description:
Snow showers moving off the mountains will continue to impact much
of central and southern Lewis and Clark County through at least 9
pm this evening, including the Helena and Lincoln areas.

Accumulations should be minor, mostly a half inch or less in the
valleys, but some mountain passes may pick up an inch or so. West
winds gusting to 30 mph will also reduce visibility to less than 2
miles in some areas.

Be careful driving around the area this evening, as roads can
quickly become icy or snow covered.

NWSheadline: Snow showers to impact the Helena area this evening
